 [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שֵׁרָה‎</span>] ***bracelet***, see  <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שׁרר‎</span>. 

 [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎שֵׁרָה‎</span>] **noun [feminine]** ==bracelet== (Aramaic <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎שֵׁירָא‎</span> ***id.***, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***chain***, [[Gen.24.22|Gen 24:22]] [[BDB#Syr|ᵑ6]] [[BDB#Tg|ᵑ7]]: Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***bracelet***, Qor 18:30 [[[BDB#Frä|Frä]]<sup>56</sup>] is said by [[BDB#Lane|Lane]]<sup>14645 to be</sup> from the Persian, and, if Sem., would be from √ <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">); — plural absolute <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הַשֵּׁרוֺת‎</span> [[Isa.3.19|Isa 3:19]] (in list of finery).
